Module com.example.c482
Package com.jpollock.c482

Class ModifyProductController

java.lang.Object
com.jpollock.c482.ModifyProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the Modify Product page and allows the users to change the information of the selected Product.
